column5: Are you interested in where we source our future energy and how we protect what we have now and in the future? Do you want to learn the complexities of the law that surrounds energy extraction?
column7: Find out about fees: abdn.ac.uk/study/international/tuition-fees-and-living-costs-287.php  View course fees on your programme page
column9: 12 Months Full Time or 24 Months Part Time
